Package hdb.data

Class TupleTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • hdb.data.TupleTest
  • public class TupleTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This program tests the Tuple class.
    Author:
    Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  TupleTest.WritingTask
      A WritingTask represents a task that can possibly write data to an ObjectOutputStream.

      • writeAttributes

        void writeAttributes​(int threshold)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes a Tuple to a ByteArrayOutputStream and then creates a new Tuple from that ByteArrayOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        threshold - a threshold for throwing an Exception indicating a failure if the amount of data written to the ByteArrayOutputStream is larger than that threshold
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray​(TupleTest.WritingTask task)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the size of data written to an ObjectOutputStream by the specified WritingTask.
        Parameters:
        task - a WritingTask
        Returns:
        the size of data written to an ObjectOutputStream by the specified WritingTask
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs
